Package com.mc.helper

Class NotifyUser

java.lang.Object
com.mc.helper.NotifyUser
public abstract class NotifyUser extends Object
Abstract class containing static methods for displaying different types of alert dialogs to the user.

    • unableToLogin

      public static void unableToLogin()

    • nothingSelected

      public static void nothingSelected(String type)
      Displays a warning alert dialog when no item is selected in the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of item not selected ("appointment" or "customer").

    • upcomingAppointments

      public static void upcomingAppointments(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentList)
      Checks for upcoming appointments within the next 15 minutes in the provided appointment list. If an appointment is found, an information alert dialog is displayed with details of the upcoming appointment. If no appointments are found within the next 15 minutes, an information alert dialog is displayed, indicating that there are no upcoming appointments. Lambda expression of forEach used in this method (appointmentList.forEach(appointment ->) which allows for more concise code and doesn't require an explicit loop.
      Parameters:
      appointmentList - The list of appointments to be checked.

    • nullInput

      public static void nullInput(String body)
      Displays a warning panel for a null input, notifying the user that the input cannot be empty.
      Parameters:
      body - The specific field that cannot be empty.

    • outsideBusinessHours

      public static void outsideBusinessHours()
      Displays a warning panel, notifying the user that an appointment is scheduled outside business hours.

    • invalidAppointmentDuration

      public static void invalidAppointmentDuration()
      Displays a warning panel, notifying the user that the appointment duration is invalid.

    • pastAppointmentDates

      public static void pastAppointmentDates()
      Displays a warning panel, notifying the user that the appointment date is in the past.

    • overlappingAppointment

      public static void overlappingAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Displays a warning panel, notifying the user that there is an overlapping appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object that overlaps with another appointment.

    • noChangesMade

      public static boolean noChangesMade()
      Displays a confirmation panel, notifying the user that no changes were made and asks the user if they want to return to the menu.
      Returns:
      true if the user wants to return to the menu, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      true if the user wants to delete the object, false otherwise.
